name: feature-build
description: Research, implement, and review a feature. The workhorse formula for most development work.

steps.title: Research {{feature}}
steps.description:
Investigate the codebase to understand integration points, existing patterns, and dependencies for {{feature}}. SUBAGENT:Explore

Post a FINDINGS: comment on the parent bead with:
- Purpose: What was investigated
- Sources: Files and patterns found
- Summary: Key findings
- Recommendations: Suggested approach

steps.title: Implement {{feature}}
steps.description:
Implement {{feature}} based on research findings. SUBAGENT:general-purpose

Post a CHANGES: comment on the parent bead listing files created/modified and a brief summary of the implementation.

steps.title: Review {{feature}}
steps.description:
Review the implementation of {{feature}} for correctness, style, and edge cases. SUBAGENT:Explore

Post a REVIEW: comment on the parent bead with verdict (REVIEW:PASS or REVIEW:BLOCK) and details.
